TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToPosition extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Presentation.TimeListType

Docs.summary: Defines the ToPosition Class. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is p:to.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **to (To)** This element specifies the target location for an animation motion or animation scale effect [*Example*: Consider an animation with a "light speed" entrance effect. ```xml ``` *end example*] |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |animMotion (§19.5.4); animScale (§19.5.6)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |x (X coordinate)|This attribute describes the X coordinate.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_Percentage* simple type (§20.1.10.40).| |y (Y coordinate)|This attribute describes the Y coordinate.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_Percentage* simple type (§20.1.10.40).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_TLPoint) is located in §A.3. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ToPosition class.
